reviewText:
Watched these movies until the tapes wore out. I know most of the lines from these movies still.

Time Waits for Snowman, Maltese Flamingo, and The Good, The Rad, & The Gnarly.

 I have been waiting for Stump to release these on DVD. Apparently he sold the rights off and the films just kind of went underground. I found these releases by accident. My Stump movie library is complete now. If you are a Stump fan, here is the end to your search.
